title: Server ping problems with DC without loss forgiveness
body: Your server shitted it self at around 7 with ping spikes and disconnections leading to a loss which was not forgiven so I lost 19 lp (2 wins worth of LP) and also we would of won if it wasn't for the ping and disconnections, I want my LP back at least and preferably the LP I would of gained if it was for the server shitting itself.

replies.body: If the server was the blame, then wouldn't it have affected the enemy team as much as it did yours?
